channel.title: Pages on Open Practice Library
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Open Practice Library

item.title: About
item.description: Red Hat Open Innovation Labs team is creating an open practice library! The library’s source is in a public GitHub repo and is licensed under Apache 2.0. What This Library Is Not An exhaustive, detailed guide to apply these practices. We’ve tried that, and folks tend to focus on the step by step instruction but miss the “Why” information. Or they just don’t read the material, which we understand. Not everyone likes reading thousands of pages of method material like we do.
